name: slm_lab
description: Modular Deep Reinforcement Learning framework in PyTorch.

scripts.watch: if pgrep grunt >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Grunt file watch-sync already running'; else node_modules/grunt/bin/grunt; fi
scripts.analyze: python3 -c 'import sys; from slm_lab.experiment import analysis; analysis.retro_analyze(sys.argv[1])'
scripts.kill: pkill -f run_lab; pkill -f graph; pkill -f slm-env; pkill -f ipykernel; pkill -f ray;
scripts.update: conda env update -f environment.yml; yarn install;

author: kengz <kengzwl@gmail.com>, lgraesser
